Concepts
========

In `azureml`, all concepts derive from a base Asset which has:

* a name
* a unique id (GUID)
* a version
* tags

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :hidden:

   concepts/workspace.rst
   concepts/data.rst
   concepts/compute.rst
   concepts/environment.rst
   concepts/model.rst
   concepts/job.rst
   concepts/endpoint.rst
